verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’m forgiven, because You were forsaken I’m accepted, You were condemned I’m alive and well, Your Spirit is within me Because You died and rose again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Amazing Love, how can it be That You, my King, should die for me. Amazing Love, I know it’s true It’s my joy to honor You In all I do, to honor You{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
